name: 4Chan Zenburned Compact#
description:
A fork of my style 43346, using the Zenburn palette.

EOL Update:
Applied style to entire site
Fixed regular reply (for real this time)
Increased post width (who needs to see the entire board name anyway)
Fixes for 4chanX (the menu actually appears)
Included User 62774's form fields from Compact++
/b/ackwash tooltip borders match the replies.
Made page table visible, as well as the stylesheet chooser (necessary for a fix)
Simplified font styles (no more underline, sad but true)
Fixed input fields using generic arial.
FLASHBLOCK BONUS: Shrunk blocked flashes to 20x20 icons, instead of representing the size of the unblocked flash.
Other general unfinished business taken care of (all syntax errors *cough* *cough*)
additional_info:
CAPTCHA Buttons, form fields and general awesomeness: User 62774

If 4chanX is on the left side of the screen and the links are underlined (and you didn't edit my style to do so), Click Yotsuba or Yotsuba B (depending on which board you're on; B for blue boards, regular for pink).

Remember to choose Terminal style for the textboards.
